title: Issues logging in
body: Currently when logging into the OCE server I am stuck on Authenticating, and in the one in five attempts where I do get into my account I am immediately greeted with the "trying to reconnect" dialogue seen in the screen linked above. This issue is only happening when trying to log into OCE, I have tried logging onto the PBE and have had no issues.

replies.body:
Might be the ISP you are with is having problems or your DNS is having problems or firewall blocked the league client for some reason.
I use Zone Alarm Firewall on strict manual approval of all connections to the internet and programs that try to do anything without my input.

https://tinyurl.com/y8m9klkf
